title: CTA Button Component
description:
Build Reusable Call-to-Action Button Component

Create a flexible, accessible button component with multiple variants for use across the site to drive user conversions and actions.

Requirements:
- Implement primary and secondary visual variants with distinct styling
- Add interactive states: default, hover, active, focus, and disabled
- Include accessible focus indicators meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards (visible focus ring, sufficient contrast)
- Support keyboard navigation (Enter/Space activation, Tab navigation)
- Provide props for customization:
  - text: Button label content
  - href or onClick: Navigation link or click handler
  - variant: 'primary' or 'secondary'
  - size: Optional sizing variants (small, medium, large)
  - disabled: Boolean to disable interaction
  - icon: Optional icon support (leading or trailing)
  - fullWidth: Optional prop for full-width buttons
- Add proper ARIA attributes (role, aria-label, aria-disabled)
- Support both link and button HTML elements based on use case (href renders as <a>, onClick as <button>)
- Ensure consistent spacing, typography, and visual hierarchy across variants
- Make responsive (touch-friendly sizing on mobile)
- Include loading state for async actions
- Document component API and usage examples
- Test across major browsers and screen readers
